member_organisations: self-employed consultant and inspector, no web.
fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Single market, Digital economy and society
head_office_address: 163#,6th. Street, Yangguang Yuan Wuyi Country Garden
eu_initiatives: CE-marking; New Approach; consumer product safety; consumer product compliance traceability;conformity module;
goals__remit: Mr. Hongwei SHI (English name: Steven) has engaged in quality and product safety field more than 20 years. In recent 10 years, his main research direction is "batch production compliance control" which will play an important and fundamental part in future product compliance mechanism. His dream is to establish a global product safety compliance scheme which can be sensible and traceable by any stakeholder via mobile internet and link to big data base.
relevant_communication:
From Mar. 2016 to present, I have make contacts with below staffs of EU commission and submit my view, proposal and presentation, would like to express my strong intention to revise present EU legislation of New Approach 
 
Ms. Vera Jourová, Commissioner  
 
Mr. Hans Ingels ,  
 
Ms. Maija Laurila ,  
 
Mr. ZACHARIAS BILALIS ,  
 
  
 
The proposal and presentation which I communicated with them in past months are listed as below: 
 
  
 
Proposal 1: “ New Approach should focus on production compliance”  
 
Proposal 2: “EU should focus on batch production compliance” 
 
Presentation 1: “Batch Production Compliance”
